cards.title: Ray Tracer
cards.text: A piece of software to generate ray traced images. Currently can generate images, but a second version is currently under way to generate ray traced video

cards.title: Hero Test
cards.text: A piece of software built on top of 2 different APIs. The first is a personality api built on top of the Big 5 personality traits commonly used in psychology. The second API evaluates the results and returns an interpretation: WHAT TYPE OF HERO ARE YOU??!!

cards.title: Web Scraper
cards.text: A piece of software that can dynamically scrape and crawl webpages.
